Description: Fragment prserving profile of small black-glazed pottery plate; light, flat-topped rim, very shallow bowl and ring foot; wholly glazed; stacking impression on interior; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 67, no. 861, pl. XXII, no. 861)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 693, no. 508)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.012)
